```{r, results='asis'}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
library(here)
library(readxl)

X <- here("data-raw", "works.xlsx") %>%
  read_xlsx("software")

X %>%
  mutate(
    repo = case_when(
      !is.na(github) ~ github,
      !is.na(gitlab) ~ gitlab,
      !is.na(bitbucket) ~ bitbucket,
      TRUE ~ github
    )
  ) %>%
  glue_data(
    "\n\n",
    "## {title}",
    "\n\n",
    "{description}",
    "\n\n",
    paste(shiny::icon("home"), "{homepage}"),
    "\n\n",
    paste(shiny::icon("github"), "{repo}"),
    "\n\n"
  )
```
